segments.text: What's the matter , Lisa ? You don't look too good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just found out that my husband is cheating on me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean Mark ? He seems like such an honest guy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's what I thought . It seems that he's been seeing someone else for about two months .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Two months ? How did you find out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I asked for leave and was at home when the telephone rang . I picked it up and a girl asked to talk to Mark . She then asked if I was his sister , and I said no , I was his wife . She hung up immediately .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you asked him about the girl who called ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , he first said it was someone from work . He gave me a lame excuse , and so I pressed him on it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He kept trying to make stupid excuses , and then broke down and admitted to a small indiscretion .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Indiscretion ? How can an indiscretion last two months ? I mean , you two have been married for two years ! How can he do that to you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I told him I would divorce him if he wouldn â€™ t tell me the truth or end the relationship with her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I totally agree with what you did .
segments.speaker: S1
